page.shortlink: ux formview builder Allow image annotation
page.description: Specify if the user can annotate this field. Annotation allows the user to use an ink control over a captured image. The image can then be saved into a List Control. For example, Here is a Form View with a captured image

section.description: A user can click the Annotate image button and draw on the image using the Ink control.
The annotated image can then be saved back into the form view control and from there into the List control.
For a complete guide on how to go about creating annotated images see [Annotation on Form View Controls].
